name: Data Science Journey
tagline: NLP, Neural Networks, Bayes, a lot of curiousity and a lot of caffeine
body:
### This site is underconstruction, to be updated by next week.

### Projects:

- The NLP language of Job Postings
- Graduation rates from High school
- Where's the WOW in WOW (World of Warcraft)
- Machine Learning treasure hunt
- (in progress) Image Recognition
- (in progress) Audio Recognition
- (TBD) NLP against famous texts

### Courses / Education

- General Assembly Data Science Immersive
- General Assembly Python for Data Science
- Coursera UCSD: Intro to Algorithms
- (in progress) Stanford Introduction to Machine Learning
- (TBD) SCALA
